title: First Bitcoin. Then GameStop. Now Tiny Tungsten Cubes.
sub_head: Online investors crave tangible pleasure of holding surprisingly heavy metal blocks; 1.7 times as dense as lead
body:
They bought the bitcoin dip. They took GameStop to the moon. Now the online investor army has a new favorite thing to buy and hold: small tungsten cubes.
Even in a year that has featured dog-meme cryptocurrencies and rappers shilling SPACs, tungsten cubes stand out. They are as inert as they sound: gray, an inch or two on each side and 1.7 times as dense as lead. A major selling point, according to Amazon.com ’s product page, is that they are “extremely heavy for their size.”
